statements: SELECT * FROM bookings;
SELECT booking_id, booking_type, booking_date FROM bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM bookings WHERE booking_type = 'Flight';
SELECT booking_id, total_amount FROM bookings WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_type = 'Flight' ORDER BY booking_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT booking_id, total_amount, booking_date FROM bookings WHERE total_amount > 500 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT booking_id, customer_id FROM bookings WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY booking_date;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND total_amount < 1000 ORDER BY booking_date;
SELECT booking_type, COUNT(booking_id) AS num_bookings FROM bookings GROUP BY booking_type HAVING COUNT(booking_id) > 10 ORDER BY num_bookings DESC;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE hotel_name = 'Marriott'
SELECT hotel_name, check_in_date FROM hotels WHERE check_out_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM flights
SELECT airline_name, flight_number FROM flights WHERE departure_date = '2022-02-15'
SELECT booking_id FROM flights
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE hotel_name = 'Hilton';
SELECT booking_id, flight_number FROM flights WHERE airline_name = 'Delta';
SELECT hotel_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM hotels WHERE check_in_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM flights ORDER BY arrival_date DESC;
SELECT hotel_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM hotels WHERE check_out_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE location='New York';
SELECT hotel_name, booking_date FROM hotels ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE destination='Paris' AND departure_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT rental_id, car_model FROM car_rentals WHERE rental_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM hotels INNER JOIN flights ON hotels.hotel_name = flights.airline_name;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT hotel_name, location FROM hotels WHERE booking_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY hotel_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE destination = 'London' AND departure_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT flight_id, airline_name FROM flights WHERE departure_date < '2022-08-15' ORDER BY flight_id DESC;
SELECT car_model, driver_license_no, rental_date FROM car_rentals WHERE rental_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY rental_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM HotelBookings;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM HotelBookings WHERE check_in_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date FROM HotelBookings ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CarRentalBookings WHERE rental_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM CustomerInfo WHERE phone_number LIKE '123%';
SELECT * FROM HotelBookings;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM HotelBookings WHERE check_in_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT booking_id, guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM HotelBookings ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM FlightBookings WHERE departure_date >= '2022-05-01' AND arrival_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT passenger_name, flight_number, departure_date, arrival_date FROM FlightBookings ORDER BY arrival_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE rating >= 4.0
SELECT id, name, location FROM hotels ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT brand, model, rental_price FROM car_rentals WHERE rental_price <= 100
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE destination='Paris' OR destination='London'
SELECT booking_id, start_date, end_date FROM reservations
SELECT name, location, rating FROM hotels WHERE rating >= 4.0 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT flight.id, flight.airline, flight.destination, booking.booking_date FROM flights AS flight INNER JOIN bookings AS booking ON flight.id = booking.id;
SELECT booking_id, start_date, end_date FROM reservations WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT id, brand, model, rental_price FROM car_rentals WHERE rental_price > 1000.00 AND brand LIKE 'Toyota%' LIMIT 5;

SELECT reservations.id, bookings.booking_date, hotels.name, flights.destination FROM reservations INNER JOIN bookings ON reservations.booking_id = bookings.id INNER JOIN hotels ON bookings.customer_id = hotels.id INNER JOIN flights ON flights.id = bookings.id ORDER BY reservations.id DESC;
